sentences.sContent: Or you can choose to accelerate your growth and intentionally devour life and all it offers .
sentences.sContent_eng: Or you can choose to accelerate your growth and intentionally devour life and all it offers .
sentences.sCn: 或者你可以选择加速你的成长，有意地吞噬生活及生活所赐予你的一切。

sentences.sContent: But in the past, we almost never intentionally or successfully utilized such wealth of information in creating, and reusing our knowledge and developed capability.
sentences.sContent_eng: But in the past, we almost never intentionally or successfully utilized such wealth of information in creating, and reusing our knowledge and developed capability.
sentences.sCn: 但是在过去，我们几乎从未有意或成功地利用这些丰富的信息创建、重用我们的知识和拓展我们的能力。

sentences.sContent: Before it was fired, it was perfectly round, but the artist intentionally roughed up the edges.
sentences.sContent_eng: Before it was fired, it was perfectly round, but the artist intentionally roughed up the edges.
sentences.sCn: 在它被烧制出来前，它相当的圆润。 但艺术家有意地把它的边缘弄粗糙。

words.tran: 专心地；一心一意地；心无旁物地
